title: Slow cooker kashmiri lamb
ingredients: ['3 dried red chillies, seeded and chopped', '3 fresh green chillies, seeded and chopped', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds', '2 teaspoons Kashmiri garam masala', '1 inch piece of root ginger, peeled and grated', '5 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons desiccated coconut', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '3 tomatoes, chopped', '6 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 large onions, sliced thinly', '1kg diced leg of lamb', 'salt, to taste', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '300g plain yoghurt', '1/2 teaspoon saffron', '20 blanched almonds', '1 handful chopped fresh coriander']
